SELECT cfi.id, cfi.user_id, cfi.file_name, cfi.file_type, cfi.file_path, cfi.upload_time,
stui.name, stui.sex, stui.phone, stui.email, stui.images, stui.user_id, ci.name as className, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName FROM certificate_file_info cfi LEFT JOIN student_info stui ON (cfi.user_id = stui.id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = stui.major_id) left join class_info ci on (ci.id = stui.class_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.teacher_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND stui.user_id = #{queryParam.userId}
AND cfi.file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.fileName},'%')
AND cfi.file_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.fileType},'%')
AND stui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.studentName},'%')
ORDER BY cfi.upload_time DESC
